pyOpTools API¶

The package pyoptools is divided in several modules. These modules separate the different functionalities:

  1. pyoptools.raytrace

    This package contains the classes and functions used to perform the simulation of optical systems using 3D non-sequential raytracing algorithms.

  2. pyoptools.wavefront

    This package contains the classes and functions used to perform the simulation of wavefronts propagation.

  3. pyoptools.misc

    This package contains miscellaneous classes and functions used by the other packages, but that can not be classified in any of them.

pyoptools.raytrace API¶

The package pyoptools.raytrace is divided in several modules. These modules separate the different functionalities found.

The defined submodules are:

  • pyoptools.raytrace.calc
  • pyoptools.raytrace.component
  • pyoptools.raytrace.ray
  • pyoptools.raytrace.shape
  • pyoptools.raytrace.surface
  • pyoptools.raytrace.system

The package pyoptools.wavefront is divided in several modules. These modules separate the different functionalities found.

The defined submodules are:

pyoptools.misc API¶

The package pyoptools.misc is divided in several modules. These modules separate the different functionalities found.

The defined submodules are:

  • pyoptools.misc.cmisc
  • pyoptools.misc.definitions
  • pyoptools.misc.frft
  • pyoptools.misc.lsq
  • pyoptools.misc.pmisc
  • pyoptools.misc.plist
  • pyoptools.misc.Poly2D
  • pyoptools.misc.resources
